article.p: I am a graduate student at the Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering of the University of New Mexico. My primary interests are:

ul.li: BSD, Linux, and other UNIX‐like operating systems
Computer security, forensics, and reverse engineering

article.p: Currently I am an intern at Sandia National Laboratories, Special Radars & Communications department.
I am also a developer for the OpenBSD operating system. My main role is as a packager: I import new software packages, update existing ones, and push bugfixes and feature improvements upstream.

Occasionally, I put pictures that I’ve taken
onto Wikimedia Commons.
The best way to reach me is by email: anthony@anjbe.name
